entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test sometimes hangs in a VM #27737
  • Automatically create a local tool-manifest when a tool is installed and no manifest exists #27736
    8.0.1xx
  • Failure to find package StyleCop.Analyzers while building source-build #27735

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27746
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Jab dependency #27742
  • removed extra EnableAnalyzers props #27740
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix test to match runtime changes #27739
    Area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Do not sign test packages #27707
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27719
    Area-Compatibility
  • Retarget MSBuildSDKResolver #27714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27720
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27721
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27711
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27710
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove timeout, reenable ProjectReferences_Graph test #27657
    Area-Watch
  • Add error when failing to resolve SDK with workload sdk resolver #27432
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1986545 #27667
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Remove various timeouts #27699
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
